name: Project Mech
description:
Honestly this thing is a buggy mess. Please don't play.

Link to the code -> https://github.com/WesleyThompson

This is just crappy little thing we put together in 6 weeks

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to look and shoot

1,2,3 keys to activate powerups

Known issues = a lot

Restarting can sometimes cause the lighting to get dimmer in various.

Toggling fullscreen while out of the main menu causes the reticle to move from the center.

Getting near to the drop-ship landing causes it to stop working

Reticle is higher than where you actually shoot
